item.title: Meta-predictive Risk Model
item.description: \(\chi^\color{red}2\) Meta-predictive Risk Model Our Meta-predictive Risk Assessment methodology allows institutions to assess the likelihood of success when implementing early warning systems. Before investing resources into a full-fledged implementation, we can assess what is likely to work and, more importantly, what will likely not work, this allowing the institution to target its investments in analytics to systems that will actually provide a return. Is there a there there, is a question that should be asked as early as possible.
